.. _gulp_index:

====
GULP
====

The General Utility Lattice Program (GULP) is a progam which excels in the implementation of lattice dynamics solutions.

GULP is extremely well documented with the `GULP manuals <https://nanochemistry.curtin.edu.au/gulp/help/manuals.cfm>`
`GULP example <https://nanochemistry.curtin.edu.au/gulp/help/examples.cfm>`_
